column4: I am having an issue where i cant run a kvm on 12.04, I can connect to the service and start it but if I start any of the instances the system drive gets mounted as RO and starts having I/O errors
if you are using libvirt with KVM, you should say you are using libvirt - not KVM.
it was the default option when installing ubuntu, it loads everything as kvm-qemu and i have libvirt, not exactly sure which it is using
